name: Wound Up (Zoolouie)
description:
A game about guiding wind-up toys to victory!

This game was made for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam and was programmed, asset created and finagled by me! 

Thanks to Leif for providing last minute assets an hour before submission.

I'm disappointing with the menu systems, but am glad I got to play around with mechanics I wasn't used to. I learned a lot and am eager to apply this knowledge to the next jam!
